alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 4:48AM EDT until March 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow with occasional heavy snowfall expected. Heaviest snow showers expected through noon EDT today. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, locally up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, leading to blowing snow. Expect the strongest winds and most significant blowing snow to occur late this morning through the afternoon. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult in some areas. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Highway M-28 between Munising and Harvey could become especially impacted by blowing snow and low visibility late this morning through this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
